dcterms:creator: Massimo Poesio
Jon Chamberlain
Udo Kruschwitz
Silviu Paun
Alexandra Uma
Juntao Yu
dcterms:description: A corpus of anaphoric information (coreference) crowdsourced through a game-with-a-purpose. It contains annotations for about 108,000 markables, with an average of 20 judgments per markable, totaling over 2.2 million judgments. The corpus includes rich annotation schemes covering singletons, expletives, and split-antecedent plurals. It also provides labels inferred using a probabilistic model of annotation for coreference.
dcterms:title: Phrase Detectives Corpus

dcterms:creator: Sameer Pradhan
Alessandro Moschitti
Nianwen Xue
Olga Uryupina
Yuchen Zhang
dcterms:description: A dataset for coreference resolution, part of the OntoNotes corpus, which includes annotations for multiple languages and genres, focusing on coreference chains and markables.
dcterms:title: ONTONOTES

dcterms:creator: Hong Chen
Zhenhua Fan
Hao Lu
Alan Yuille
Shu Rong
dcterms:description: A large-scale dataset for coreference resolution, particularly focusing on preschool vocabulary, with annotations for coreference chains and markables.
dcterms:title: PRECO

dcterms:creator: Marta Recasens
M. Ant`onia MartA A
dcterms:description: A corpus for coreference resolution in Spanish and Catalan, including various anaphoric phenomena such as singletons, expletives, and split-antecedent plurals.
dcterms:title: ARRAU

dcterms:creator: Johan Bos
Valerio Basile
Kilian Evang
Noortje J. Venhuizen
Johannes Bjerva
dcterms:description: A corpus created through the Wordrobe platform, focusing on collaborative annotation for various linguistic phenomena, including coreference.
dcterms:title: Groningen Meaning Bank
